title: Three-Peat in Sight, Tampa Bay Lightning Face Tough Test
description: The two-time N.H.L. defending champion Lightning faced elimination in the first round and fell behind, 2-0, in the Eastern Conference finals. Still, a deep Colorado team may be their biggest obstacle.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:credit: Nathan Ray Seebeck/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Tampa Bay fell behind the Rangers, two games to none, in the Eastern Conference finals, but won four games in a row to reach the Stanley Cup finals.
